title: unnai anri enakku
sahitya:
unnai anri enakku uNDO vEru tuNai cenni malai vAsanE ennidaya nEsanE


anupallavi

  enna sheiduivadu enru Engum pOdu unnaDi sEra vandu uru tuNai kOrum pOdu


caraNam    ninaitta kAriyattai ninaitta vAreLidil niraivETriDa un varaiyilA krpaiyil
tinai aLavEnum inda dInanukkum tandu tuNaiyAga ninrennai aNaiya vEnumaiyE
